author: Staff Reporter
text:
Workers’ rights were under attack and it was time for all trade unions to fight together on a common platform, said Gurudas Dasgupta, general secretary, All India Trade Union Congress, at the organisation’s 41{+s}{+t}session that is under way here from February 25 to 28.

Addressing the inaugural session, Mr. Dasgupta said the country was in a “critical situation” where workers’ rights were under attack by the Centre that was trying to change labour laws to suit corporate companies and multi-national companies. It was time that all trade unions joined hands to oppose the move to snatch away labour rights. It was with this intention that the AITUC had made ‘unity is strength’ as its slogan for the 41{+s}{+t}session.
title: “Workers’ rights under attack”
